reviews.review_full:
I’ve just finished my foundation course with Carl at Acuphys. The course was well organised, informative, and fun. With a good balance of practical and theory. Carl is very knowledgeable and is comfortable to answer any questions you have regarding acupuncture.
I would highly recommend this course.
reviews.review_summary: The course was well organised, informative, and fun. With a good balance of practical and theory.

reviews.review_full: Carl came all the way to Bermuda to teach the foundation level acupuncture course. Having been on countless courses in the last 10 years, I can safely say Carl's teaching methods were a breath of fresh air! Made learning so much more fun - looking forward to doing more courses with him in the future
reviews.review_summary: Having been on countless courses in the last 10 years, I can safely say Carl's teaching methods were a breath of fresh air! Made learning so much more fun

reviews.review_full: I took the Acuphys course this past weekend with Carl in Newcastle, and it exceeded every expectation. As an internationally trained physiotherapist (currently practicing in Canada), this was my first international professional development course, and I will certainly look to take more of them in the future. Carl’s teaching style was effective and enjoyable and he really took the time to ensure it was personalized to each individual's learning style. He was respectful, knowledgeable, and also had the most incredible shoes. I’m excited to bring these skills back to Canada, and I highly recommend his course to anyone looking to add dry needling to their tool belt!
reviews.review_summary: Carl’s teaching style was effective and enjoyable and he really took the time to ensure it was personalized to each individual's learning style.
